channel.title: Fixing 1v1

item.title: Fixing 1v1
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

ooookay well im trying 2 add 1v1 only in certain areas… think u culd help meh 4 rep?

if(Atk.hitID != 0 && (absX >= 3074 && absX <= 3105 && absY >= 3521 && absY <= 3551)) { sendMessage("Someone else is already fighting your opponent."); ResetAttack(); } if(hitID == Atk.playerId && (absX >= 3074 && absX <= 3105 && absY >= 3521 && absY <= 3551)) { sendMessage("I'm already under attack."); ResetAttack(); }

those r my codes… it only words, it makes it 1v1 in my edgy wild…

but it doesn’t work… its like they dont even do anything…

any1 help? rep+[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2008, 12:06:24 am[/size][hr]been 20 minutes… any1 got a clue???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2008, 05:12:13 pm[/size][hr]bump… (mts)
